attributes.action: Make Mephedrone a class A drug
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm trying to get this drug made class a because of the damage its causing i have start a hate group for this drug on facebook and got over a thousand members with some really shocking storys to tell so if we can make this drug harder to get it my stop some people from taking it or trying it in the first place and if i can stop even one person from taking it thats better then none

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
